title: aaLalaagaadhaa
sahitya:
ALalAgAdA aDiyEnai nAthA nI tAn



anupallavi



ALAi nin ponnaDikkaDimai pUNDanudinam Arumukha hara guruguha pannIrukara

muruga enruruga tan



caraNam



digambari trishUladhari jagam tarum jaTAdhari hATakAmbari harasakhi hari

sOdari sundara taru sutanE

aham tanil ninainda nal varam tara ishainda nAyAsa kavi kunjaradAsa vishvAsanai

nEshamoDu
